ActCanada Post Corporation Act
PrecisREGULATIONS AMENDING THE SPECIAL SERVICES AND FEES REGULATIONS by increasing rates charged for registered mail delivered in Canada, an option that provides senders of letter mail with proof of mailing and the ability to confirm delivery for items delivered in Canada, effective January 12, 2009.
